code:
classDiagram
    %% ============================================
    %% Sprint 2: Advanced User/Profile Management & Category Management
    %% Duration: 19 Oct 2025 - 26 Oct 2025
    %% User Stories: #4, #5, #7, #9, #10, #12, #35, #36, #37, #38, #39
    %% ============================================

    %% ============================================
    %% ENUMS
    %% ============================================
    
    class UserStatus {
        <<enumeration>>
        ACTIVE
        SUSPENDED
        DELETED
    }

    class ProfileStatus {
        <<enumeration>>
        ACTIVE
        SUSPENDED
        DEACTIVATED
    }

    %% ============================================
    %% CORE AUTHENTICATION & AUTHORIZATION
    %% ============================================

    class UserAccount {
        -UUID id
        -String email
        -String password
        -String name
        -String phoneNumber
        -String address
        -Date dateOfBirth
        -UserStatus status
        -UUID userProfileId
        -DateTime createdAt
        -DateTime updatedAt
        -Integer age
        -String location
        -String accessibilityNeeds
        -String profilePhoto
        -String companyName
        -String companyRegistrationNumber
        -String industry
        -String contactPerson
        -String companyAddress
        -String companyLogo
        -String department
        -ProfileStatus profileStatus
        +getRole() String
        +toJSON() Object
        +findAll(page, limit)$ UserAccount[]
        +findById(id)$ UserAccount
        +findByEmail(email)$ UserAccount
        +login(email, password)$ LoginResult
        +findByProfileName(name)$ UserAccount[]
        +create(data)$ UserAccount
        +update(id, data)$ UserAccount
        +suspend(id)$ UserAccount
        +activate(id)$ UserAccount
        +count()$ Number
        +search(query, page, limit)$ UserAccount[]
    }

    class UserProfile {
        -UUID id
        -String name
        -String description
        -JSON permissions
        -Boolean isActive
        -DateTime createdAt
        -DateTime updatedAt
        +findAll()$ UserProfile[]
        +findById(id)$ UserProfile
        +findByName(name)$ UserProfile
        +create(data)$ UserProfile
        +update(id, data)$ UserProfile
        +count()$ Number
        +search(query, isActive)$ UserProfile[]
    }

    %% ============================================
    %% CATEGORY MANAGEMENT (New in Sprint 2)
    %% ============================================

    class RequestCategory {
        -UUID id
        -String name
        -String description
        -String iconUrl
        -Boolean isActive
        -DateTime createdAt
        -DateTime updatedAt
        +findAll()$ RequestCategory[]
        +findActive()$ RequestCategory[]
        +findById(id)$ RequestCategory
        +create(data)$ RequestCategory
        +update(id, data)$ RequestCategory
        +delete(id)$ Boolean
        +search(query, includeInactive)$ RequestCategory[]
        +count()$ Number
    }

    %% ============================================
    %% RELATIONSHIPS
    %% ============================================
repo_description: In this project, your team is asked to design and develop a system to match Corporate Social Responsibility (CSR) corporate volunteers (CV) to the person-in-need (PIN). Each company will have a main C
